Package client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandHandler
    commands written by other classes are sent to the server
    ConnectionHandler
    main class creates a object of the connectionHandler connectionHandler creates a socket which stays open until the logout it handles incoming requests and hands them off to other classes the socket is used by other classes to send messages to the server
    GUIBoosterController  
    GUIBuildingController  
    GUIBuyController  
    GUIChartsController  
    GUIGameController  
    GUIGameEndController
    window shows when game is finished player can choose to go back to lobby or log out
    GUIHighscoreController
    handles GUIHighscore.fxml shows highscore list (top three) in game if window requested
    GUILoadingScreenController  
    GUILobbyController
    handles GUILobby.fxml proved username is shown shows list of lobby and group members chat function: lobby and whisper player can open new group, invite other player or accept invite game can be startet with optional parameters
    GUILoginController
    handles GUILogin.fxml player can choose username leads to lobby scene
    GUILogoutController
    if player hits logout-button, this window shows player has option to logout or go back to the scene
    GUILostConnectionController  
    GUIMonthlyUpdateController  
    GUIRankingController  
    GUIRulesController  
    GUISabotageController  
    GUISellController  
    GUISpyController  
    GUIStart
    is called by client/Main starts GUI
    Main
    takes the ip and the username as arguments starts the connectionHandler which opens a socket to communicate with the server starts the gui, the pingsender and the commandhandler
    PingSender  
    Updater
